text:
If you haven't already, make sure to post this in two spots (pleasssse) to increase visibility to community members and HubSpotters:
1) <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> (could just copy the link of this thread and repost)
2) Copy/paste a post in here <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage>
